title: 96/139/EC: Commission Decision of 24 January 1996 amending the list of national standardization bodies in Annex II to Council Directive 83/189/EEC
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 24 January 1996 amending the list of national standardization bodies in Annex II to Council Directive 83/189/EEC (96/139/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The list of national standardization bodies in Annex II to Directive 83/189/EEC is hereby replaced by the list annexed to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 January 1996.
For the Commission
Martin BANGEMANN
Member of the Commission
